entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023
